ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Armoring a Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: The rumor is that there is a armour flag for the pet, either its on or off. So any one piece of armour of any kind will turn this flag on. Wont matter if you
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Armoring a Pet
The rumor is that there is a armour flag for the pet, either its on or off. So any one piece of armour of any kind will turn this flag on. Wont matter if you give your pet a single cloth veil or a full set of bronze.
 
I wish the armour graphics would show though. Would be neat to see the actual graphics when you outfit a pet in armour.
 
-Manbik Prodo'Lues "The Plague Bringer"
-----Original Message-----
From: Aaron DeLeskie [mailto:deleskie@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2000 7:40 AM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Armoring a Pet

Might not be a bad idea. For a big raid If yer 50+ money isn't really an issue and you could probably outfit your pet in full bronze. Couple of Summoned swords and it'd be unstoppable. I wonder if anyone has done any tests on this?

Bonechiller.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Lacy [mailto:mlacy@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 8:48 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Armoring a Pet


There was a post by Brad ages ago before the first of the pet nerfs
that you could give armor to your pet and it would help it out.  I
don't know if that's in fact true tho but I've been giving armor to
my pets ever since.

Maldain Demorte
Lvl 43 Necromancer of E'ci


This list is basically unmoderated.  However abusive language will not be tolerated
